snippet: ROSEN--Baran. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the loss of our longtime, dedicated member Baran Rosen, beloved husband of Margery Rosen. We will miss his devotion to family, friends and community. Our deepest condolences to Margery, their children, Sarah and Michael, and all dear ones. Robert N. Levine, D.D., Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Baran. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the loss of our longtime, dedicated member Baran Rosen, beloved husband of Margery Rosen. We will miss his devotion to family, friends and community. Our deepest condolences to Margery, their children, Sarah and Michael, and all dear ones. Robert N.
